committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: To amend section 203 of the National Housing Act to reduce the minimum downpayment required for a mortgage on a 1- to 4-family residence located in Alaska, Guam, Hawaii, or the Virgin Islands to be eligible for mortgage insurance under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to reduce the minimum mortgage downpayment necessary to qualify for mortgage insurance in Alaska, Guam, Hawaii, or the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: To amend section 203 of the National Housing Act to reduce the minimum downpayment required for a mortgage on a 1- to 4-family residence located in Alaska, Guam, Hawaii, or the Virgin Islands to be eligible for mortgage insurance under such Act.
